data.text: @ItaOKelly Richard as I had, "shown interest in Cliff Richard". It's insidious, listening everywhere. It knows your darkest secrets.
@ItaOKelly Cliff Richard. I mentioned on the phone (my landline) to a friend about this. The next day I kept getting notes from Google about Cliff
@ItaOKelly Yep, a month or so back I had a Cliff Richard song going round in my head. I refused to google it as I didn't want constant updates about
